value.title: Introduction to Azure Kubernetes Service
value.excerpt: Get acquainted with the Azure Kubernetes open-source container-orchestration system for automating application deployment, scaling, and management.

value.title: Build a containerized web application with Docker
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Docker to build, store, and manage private container images with the Azure Container Registry.

value.title: Manage Agile software delivery plans across teams
value.excerpt: Learn to optimize delivery efficiency by improving work plan visibility across teams.

value.title: Manage users and groups in Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Manage users and groups in Azure Active Directory

value.title: Query relational data in Azure
value.excerpt: Query relational data in Azure

value.title: Recognize and synthesize speech
value.excerpt: Learn how to recognize and synthesize speech by using Azure Cognitive Services.

value.title: Enabling secure remote work using Windows Virtual Desktop | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Windows Virtual Desktop (WVD) is a comprehensive desktop and app virtualization service running in Azure to enable secure remote work. Christiaan Brinkhoff joins Scott Hanselman to show how WVD is different from other desktop virtualization technologies, as well as how easy it is to implement and maintain.
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/dL1LpGpGRIo" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: How to create a virtual machine in Azure | Azure Portal Series
value.excerpt: Azure provides multiple virtual machine configuration options for you to set up your virtual machine exactly how you want for whatever you're trying to do. In this video of the Azure Portal “How To” Series, learn how to configure a basic virtual machine and connect to it in minutes in the Azure portal.
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/rOiSRkxtTeU" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: How to use Azure Bastion to connect securely to your Azure VMs | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Using a bastion host can help limit threats such as port scanning and other types of malware targeting your VMs. Ashish Jain joins Scott Hanselman to show how Azure Bastion gives you secure and seamless RDP and SSH access to your virtual machines. Now you can securely access your VMs over SSL from the
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/WElUQm02BTU" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Allow users to reset their password with Azure Active Directory self-service password reset
value.excerpt: Learn how to allow users to reset their password with Azure Active Directory self-service password reset.

value.title: Scale an App Service web app to efficiently meet demand with App Service scale up and scale out
value.excerpt: Learn how to respond to periods of increased activity by incrementally increasing the resources available and then freeing these resources when activity drops.

value.title: Build a scalable application with virtual machine scale sets
value.excerpt: Enable your application to automatically adjust to changes in load while minimizing costs with virtual machine scale sets.

value.title: Create a language model with Language Understanding
value.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS) and show how to build and publish a LUIS model.

value.title: Explore the authentication capabilities of Azure AD
value.excerpt: Explore the authentication capabilities of Azure AD

value.excerpt: Explore provisioning and deploying relational database offerings in Azure

value.title: Improve application scalability and resiliency by using Azure Load Balancer
value.excerpt: In this module, you will learn how to use Azure Load Balancer to distribute traffic between multiple virtual servers or services.

value.title: Distribute your services across Azure virtual networks and integrate them by using virtual network peering
value.excerpt: Use virtual network peering to enable communication across virtual networks in a way that's secure and minimally complex.

value.title: Introduction to Azure IoT Hub
value.excerpt: University of Oxford

value.title: Introduction to GitHub
value.excerpt: Learn to use key GitHub features, including issues, notifications, branches, commits, and pull requests.

value.title: Define identity and access management in Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Learn about identity and access management in Azure Active Directory and why identity is a core component of your organization’s security posture.

value.title: Fundamentals of computer networking
value.excerpt: You'll learn the fundamental principles of computer networking to prepare you for the Azure admin and developer learning paths.

value.title: Petabyte-scale ingestion with Azure Data Factory or Azure Synapse Pipeline
value.excerpt: Petabyte-scale ingestion with Azure Data Factory or Azure Synapse Pipeline

value.title: Run Docker containers with Azure Container Instances
value.excerpt: Learn how to run and troubleshoot containerized apps using Docker containers with Azure Container Instances.

value.title: Secure and isolate access to Azure resources by using network security groups and service endpoints
value.excerpt: Find out how Azure network security groups and service endpoints help you secure your virtual machines and Azure services from unauthorized network access.

value.title: Translate text and speech
value.excerpt: Automated translation capabilities in an AI solution enables closer collaboration by removing language barriers.

value.title: Azure Certifications for developers | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, you'll learn about the Azure Certifications for developers.    For more tips and tricks, visit: https://aka.ms/azuretipsandtricks     Get started with 12 months of free services and $200 USD in credit. Create your free account today with Microsoft Azure: https://azure.com/free

value.title: How to connect and deliver services privately on Azure with Azure Private Link | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Narayan Anamalai joins Donovan Brown to introduce Azure Private Link. In this episode, Narayan demonstrates how you can secure Azure PaaS resources and your Azure network using Private Link, and provide protection against data exfiltration.  8:45 - Demo  Azure Private Link overview https://aka.ms/azfr/610/01
